医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大流行前较高的体力活动水平与患 COVID-19 和住院的几率较低相关研究人员探讨了 45 岁以上美国成年人大流行前的活动水平与他们患上 COVID-19 并住院的可能性之间的可能联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Higher-prepandemic-physical-activity-levels-linked-with-lower-odds-of-developmenting-and-being-hospitalized-for-COVID-19。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Higher-prepandemic-physical-activity-levels-linked-with-lower-odds-of-developmenting-and-being-hospitalized-for-COVID-19。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44e396d1-6374-4bc3-a575-09457f0ec379 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 09:06:00 -0500 Higher prepandemic physical activity levels associated with lower odds of developing and being hospitalized for COVID-19
HartWacht 应用程序可为阿姆斯特丹 UMC 患者提供远程血压和心律失常监测从今天开始，阿姆斯特丹 UMC 心脏中心的患者和医生可以使用应用程序 HartWacht（HeartGuard，英文）来补充他们的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/HartWacht-app-enables-remote-blood-Pressure-and-arrhythmia-monitoring-for-Amsterdam-UMC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/HartWacht-app-enables-remote-blood-Pressure-and-arrythmia-monitoring-for-Amsterdam-UMC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=240c7588-8300-4965-b74e-43d4f21b0e8c Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:46:10 -0500 HartWacht app enables remote blood pressure and arrhythmia monitoring for Amsterdam UMC patients
研究探索富硒和富锌鸡蛋的健康益处研究人员研究了富硒和/或富锌鸡蛋 (SZE) 饮食对 D-半乳糖诱导的衰老小鼠氧化应激、认知障碍和肠道菌群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Study-explores-health-benefits-of-selenium-and-zinc-enriched-eggs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Study-explores-health-benefits-of-selenium-and-zinc-enriched-eggs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35b2816a-7f1c-49f4-8633-0b2f5e30fc27 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:43:00 -0500 Study explores health benefits of selenium and zinc-enriched eggs
祖父母的距离和健康状况影响母亲抗抑郁药物的使用一项新的研究发现，如果母亲和公公婆婆身体健康并且住在附近，那么母亲服用抗抑郁药的可能性就会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Proximity-and-health-of-grandparents-influence-mothers-antidepressant-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Proximity-and-health-of-grandparents-influence-mothers-antidepressant-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c750bea-a293-4a00-a935-0b635ba2bde4 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:41:05 -0500 Proximity and health of grandparents influence mothers' antidepressant use
联合疗法在针对潜在 HIV 病毒库方面显示出希望抗逆转录病毒疗法 (ART) 可阻止 HIV 复制，使 HIV 感染者能够过上相对正常的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-targeting-latent-HIV-reservoirs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-targeting-latent-HIV-reservoirs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8090c9ce-b200-4dcc-8186-63fe5068d561 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:34:26 -0500 Combination therapy shows promise in targeting latent HIV reservoirs
D-CARE 研究强调了多样化痴呆症护理的包容性招募策略据阿尔茨海默病协会称，超过 650 万美国人患有阿尔茨海默病，三分之一的老年人将死于这种疾病或其他形式的痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/D-CARE-study-highlights-inclusive-recruitment-strategies-for-diverse-dementia-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/D-CARE-study-highlights-inclusive-recruitment-strategies-for-diverse-dementia-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60bd5224-4764-4789-a5a3-9ec0b8fab801 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:29:05 -0500 D-CARE study highlights inclusive recruitment strategies for diverse dementia care
童年时受到欺凌、不信任他人的青少年比没有信任问题的青少年成年后心理健康风险更高研究人员研究了童年经历欺凌对青春期心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Teens-bullied-in-childhood-who-mistrust-others-have-higher-adult-mental-health-risks-than-those-without-trust-问题.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Teens-bullied-in-childhood-who-mistrust-others-have-higher-adult-mental-health-risks-than-those-without-trust- issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c654f1d-df1c-4a9e-af2a-439e78dc8541 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 08:08:00 -0500 Teens bullied in childhood who mistrust others have higher adult mental health risks than those without trust issues
双胞胎研究调查微生物组作为精神障碍调节剂的作用研究人员检查了肠道微生物组扰动对各种生物过程的影响，例如下丘脑-垂体-肾上腺轴的失调、免疫系统的性能以及神经递质和短链脂肪酸的产生，是否会导致这种表现和进展心理健康障碍，如焦虑、抑郁和饮食失调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Twin-study-investigates-the-role-of-the-microbiome-as-a-modifier-in-mental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Twin-study-investigates-the-role-of-the-microbiome-as-a-modifier-in-mental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad48b066-4a3d-441a-b893-8f1ea2f92378 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 07:46:00 -0500 Twin study investigates the role of the microbiome as a modifier in mental disorders
早期检测可能有助于肯塔基州遏制肺癌危机医生分享了安东尼·斯通博母亲的胸部 X 光片后，他的心沉了下去。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Early-detection-may-help-Kentucky-tamp-down-its-lung-cancer-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Early-detection-may-help-Kentucky-tamp-down-its-lung-cancer-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30f95b9-024c-4b12-8060-9c8d8298c3c5 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 07:43:49 -0500 Early detection may help Kentucky tamp down its lung cancer crisis
靶向治疗和免疫治疗的组合可以通过克服免疫抵抗和增强抗肿瘤活性来促进非小细胞肺癌的治疗研究人员评估了晚期/转移性非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）的合理联合治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Combo-of-targeted-and-immunotherapy-may-boost-NSCLC-treatment-by-overcoming-immune-resistance-and-enhancing-anti-tumor-活动.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Combo-of-targeted-and-immunotherapy-may-boost-NSCLC-treatment-by-overcoming-immune-resistance-and-enhancing-anti-tumor-活动.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=837dd510-8519-4dce-8011-a0ec758eaaac Thu, 15 Feb 2024 07:27:00 -0500 Combo of targeted and immunotherapy may boost NSCLC treatment by overcoming immune resistance and enhancing anti-tumor activity
